## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] My code is DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) where applicable
- [ ] I have kept functions small and focused

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly (README.md, etc.)
- [ ] I have added/updated comments in the code where necessary
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] Any new features are documented

### Translation (if applicable)

- [ ] I have added translations for all new strings
- [ ] I have tested all language variants
- [ ] Translations maintain professional tone
- [ ] Text length doesn't break layouts in any language

### Functionality

- [ ] My changes don't break existing functionality
- [ ] All form inputs work correctly
- [ ] Letter generation works as expected
- [ ] Auto-save functionality works
- [ ] Print/PDF export works correctly
- [ ] localStorage persistence works

### Accessibility & Responsiveness

- [ ] My changes are responsive (work on mobile, tablet, desktop)
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels where needed
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works correctly
- [ ] Color contrast is sufficient

### Browser Compatibility

- [ ] Tested on multiple browsers (see Test Configuration above)
- [ ] No browser-specific code without fallbacks
- [ ] ES6+ features are appropriate for target browsers
- [ ] CSS features have appropriate fallbacks

### Git Hygiene

- [ ] My commits follow the conventional commits format
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] I have rebased onto the latest main branch
- [ ] No merge conflicts exist
